EmailTemplate.description: Email Survey Feedback of a session
EmailTemplate.name: ERM Stakeholder Survey Feedback
EmailTemplate.subject: ERM Survey Feedback - {!ERM_Stakeholder__c.Event_Name__c} : {!ERM_Stakeholder__c.Session_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear colleague(s),
{!ERM_Stakeholder__c.Name} has declined the presence for the session {!ERM_Stakeholder__c.Session__c} for {!ERM_Stakeholder__c.Event_Name__c}.
Please click on the link to suggest a suitable replacement.
Click here to see how to replace a presenter in sCRM.
